title: "Design and Social Impact" book — Need help identifying typeface
content:
Typophilers,

My friend and I recently got a book called "Design and Social Impact" and can't seem to identify the typeface. Please help us identity the bold condensed typeface!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730044844im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_6544.JPG)
author: Ken W

comments.content: ...ever-so-slightly vertically scaled? Interesting. But definitely Tungsten and not Dharma (which is lovely!). You can tell by the curve on the 'S'.
